mapper.select: SELECT u.userEmail, u.userPassword, u.userName, u.userProfileImage, u.userLocation, u.userAge, u.userGender, u.userNickname, u.userMBTI, s.campStyle1, s.campStyle2, s.campStyle3, s.campStyle4, s.campStyle5, s.campStyle6, e.campEquipTent, e.campEquipSleepingbag, e.campEquipBurner, e.campEquipBrazier, e.campEquipEtc1, e.campEquipEtc2, e.campEquipEtc3, e.campEquipEtc4, e.campEquipEtc5 FROM user u, campStyle s, campEquip e WHERE u.userNo = s.userNo AND u.userNo = e.userNo AND u.userEmail = #{userEmail};
